title: Ability to process large data sets

content.question: A programmer is writing a program that is intended to be able to process large amounts of data. Which of the following considerations is LEAST likely to affect the ability of the program to process larger data sets?

choices.label: How long the program takes to run
How many programming statements the program contains
How much memory the program requires as it runs
How much storage space the program requires as it runs

content.answer: How many programming statements the program contains

skill.text: Skill 5.D: Describe the impact of gathering data.
